hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rm -rf zstack zstack-utility zstack-dashboard zstack_ci mkdir -p zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER} mkdir -p zstack tar -x -C zstack -f zstack.tar rm -rf zstack.tar cd zstack echo -n "zstack: " > ../zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt git log -1 --format="%H %ci %an: %s" >> ../zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt cd .. mkdir -p zstack-utility tar -x -C zstack-utility -f zstack-utility.tar rm -rf zstack-utility.tar cd zstack-utility echo -n "zstack-utility: " >> ../zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt git log -1 --format="%H %ci %an: %s" >> ../zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt cd .. mkdir -p zstack-dashboard tar -x -C zstack-dashboard -f zstack-dashboard.tar rm -rf zstack-dashboard.tar cd zstack-dashboard echo -n "zstack-dashboard: " >> ../zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt git log -1 --format="%H %ci %an: %s" >> ../zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt cd .. cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/apache-tomcat-7.0.35.zip apache-tomcat-7.0.35.zip cd zstack #mvn -DskipTests clean install cd ../zstack-utility/zstackbuild ORIGINAL_PRODUCT_VERSION=`cat build.properties|grep product.version|awk -F '=' '{print $2}'` TIME_STAMP=`date +"%y%m%d"` ant -Dzstack_build_root=${WORKSPACE} -Dproduct.version=${ORIGINAL_PRODUCT_VERSION}-${TIME_STAMP}-${BUILD_NUMBER} all-in-one cd ../../ ZSTACK_BIN=$(basename `ls zstack-utility/zstackbuild/target/*.bin`) cp zstack-utility/zstackbuild/target/*.bin zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/ echo "" > zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo "" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo "zstack build ${BUILD_NUMBER}</title" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo "<body>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo "<table border=1>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo "<tr>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo " <th>ZStack build</th>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo " <th><a href=${ZSTACK_BIN}>${ZSTACK_BIN}</a></th>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo " <th></th>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo "</tr>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html for i in $(seq `wc -l zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt|awk '{print $1}'`); do COMPONENT=`sed -n "${i}p" zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt | awk '{print $1}'` COMMIT=`sed -n "${i}p" zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt | awk '{print $2}'` SUBJECT=`sed -n "${i}p" zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt | awk '{for (i=3; i<NF; i++) printf("%s ",$i);print $i}'` echo "<tr>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo " <td>${COMPONENT}</td>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo " <td>${COMMIT}</td>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo " <td>${SUBJECT}</td>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo "</tr>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html done echo "</table>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo "</body>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html echo "</html>" >> zstack_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/index.html rm -rf zstack_ci/latest ln -s ${BUILD_NUMBER} zstack_ci/latest ln -s ${ZSTACK_BIN} zstack_ci/latest/zstack-installer.bin
